# Changes to Pokemon & Abilities

- Rotom is now a regional Pokemon exclusively found in Electric or Artificial regions.
- Nerf Blacephalon: PP 120 → 150
- Nerf Iron Thorns Volt Surge
  - HP buff : 50 → 40
  - Speed buff : 30 → 20
  - Remove Max HP/ electric field/ Speed buff on resurrection
- Nerf Mimikyu passive protect duration 2s -> 1.5s, bonus atk 10 -> 8
- Nerf Revavroom line.
  - Base speed : 50 → 40
  - Speed gain per tile : 20 → 15
- Buff Ralts Attack 5/12/26 → 6/15/26 PP 100 -> 95
- Buff Nacli PP 100 → 80
- Buff Oshawott +10/20/30 base HP
- Buff Smoliv PP 100 -> 90
- Nerf Zapdos PP 100 -> 110
- Nerf Bellibot base HP 90/220 -> 85/190
- Nerf Happy Hour Attack Buff 2/5/8 -> 2/4/7

# Changes to Synergies

- Nerf Cell battery 
  - Shield : 50 → 30
  - Speed : 30 → 20 
  - Passive Speed: 3% -> 2%
- Buff Aquatic Waves delay : 8s → 7s

# Changes to Items

- Nerf Loaded Dice Splash damage : 100% → 75%
